TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEntityChangeTracker

Docs.summary: Defines the facilities that are used by Object Services to track changes that are made to the properties of an object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.ComplexObject> are the base classes for entity types and complex types generated by the Entity Data Model tools. Both base classes use <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> to report property changes.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

MemberSignature.Value: public void EntityComplexMemberChanged (string entityMemberName, object complexObject, string complexObjectMemberName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EntityComplexMemberChanged(string entityMemberName, object complexObject, string complexObjectMemberName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the complex property of the entity type that has changed.
The complex type that contains the property that changed.
The name of the property that changed on complex type.
Docs.summary: Notifies the change tracker that a property of a complex type has changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker.EntityComplexMemberChanged%2A> is used by <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.ComplexObject> to report that a property has changed.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

MemberSignature.Value: public void EntityComplexMemberChanging (string entityMemberName, object complexObject, string complexObjectMemberName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EntityComplexMemberChanging(string entityMemberName, object complexObject, string complexObjectMemberName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the top-level entity property that is changing.
The complex type that contains the property that is changing.
The name of the property that is changing on complex type.
Docs.summary: Notifies the change tracker of a pending change to a complex property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker.EntityComplexMemberChanging%2A> is used by <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.ComplexObject> to report that a complex property is changing.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EntityMemberChanged(string entityMemberName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the property that has changed.
Docs.summary: Notifies the change tracker that a property of an entity type has changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker.EntityMemberChanged%2A> is used by <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject> to report that a property has changed.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EntityMemberChanging(string entityMemberName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the property that is changing.
Docs.summary: Notifies the change tracker of a pending change to a property of an entity type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker.EntityMemberChanging%2A> is used by <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject> to report that a property is changing.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

Docs.summary: Gets current state of a tracked object.
Docs.value:
An that is the state of the tracked object.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).
